name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 66: An Official Satan

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this week’s show we talk all about Satan and art and being a bathroom liar. And, reminder, everything said on this show is a joke or a bit or in reference to the video game “Husband Hurler” for the 3DO. We would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
